Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-40909 affecting package perl for versions less than 5.34.1-491
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-40909 affecting package perl for versions less than 5.34.1-491. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package perl is earlier than 5.34.1-491, affected by CVE-2025-40909
